Sentencas: Biomass gasification derived fuel gas is a renewable fuel that can be used by high temperature fuel cells.
Titulo: High temperature solid oxide fuel cell integrated with novel allothermal biomass gasification. Part I: Modelling and feasibility study

Sentencas: In this two-part work an attempt is made to investigate the integration of a near atmospheric pressure solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) with a novel allothermal biomass steam gasification process into a combined heat and power (CHP) system of less than MWe nominal output range.
Titulo: High temperature solid oxide fuel cell integrated with novel allothermal biomass gasification. Part I: Modelling and feasibility study

Sentencas: Heat for steam gasification is supplied from SOFC depleted fuel into a fluidised bed combustor via high temperature sodium heat pipes.
Titulo: High temperature solid oxide fuel cell integrated with novel allothermal biomass gasification. Part I: Modelling and feasibility study

Sentencas: The integrated system model was built in Aspen Plus (TM) simulation software and is described in detail.
Titulo: High temperature solid oxide fuel cell integrated with novel allothermal biomass gasification. Part I: Modelling and feasibility study

Sentencas: Part I investigates the feasibility and critical aspects of the system based on modelling results.
Titulo: High temperature solid oxide fuel cell integrated with novel allothermal biomass gasification. Part I: Modelling and feasibility study

Sentencas: A low gasification steam to biomass ratio (STBR=0.6) is used to avoid excess heat demands and to allow effective H2S high temperature removal.
Titulo: High temperature solid oxide fuel cell integrated with novel allothermal biomass gasification. Part I: Modelling and feasibility study

Sentencas: Water vapour is added prior to the anode to avoid carbon deposition.
Titulo: High temperature solid oxide fuel cell integrated with novel allothermal biomass gasification. Part I: Modelling and feasibility study

Sentencas: The SOFC off gases adequately provide gasification heat when fuel utilisation factors are < 0.75; otherwise extra biomass must be combusted with overall efficiency penalty.
Titulo: High temperature solid oxide fuel cell integrated with novel allothermal biomass gasification. Part I: Modelling and feasibility study

Sentencas: For SOFC operation with U-f = 0.7 and current density 2500 A m(-2) the electrical efficiency is estimated at 36% while thermal efficiency at 14%.
Titulo: High temperature solid oxide fuel cell integrated with novel allothermal biomass gasification. Part I: Modelling and feasibility study

Sentencas: An exergy analysis is presented in Part II.
Titulo: High temperature solid oxide fuel cell integrated with novel allothermal biomass gasification. Part I: Modelling and feasibility study
